InvalidDriverException Class Reference

Public Member Functions

 __construct ($driverName)

Detailed Description

Invalid driver exception.

An exception thrown when Database::setDriver() encounters an invalid (e.g. undefined/doesn't implement DatabaseDriver interface) driver name.

exceptions

1.0
